A dove with wings spread wide, holding an olive branch in its beak, symbolizing the concept of peace and harmony.
A circle with two intertwined hands in the center, representing unity and mutual respect.
A heart with two halves joined together, symbolizing the unity of all living beings.
A white flag with a blue circle in the center, representing surrender and the end of conflict.
A rainbow with the colors of the world coming together in harmony, symbolizing the beauty of diversity and unity.
